magic_luck.description: :skull: A disastrous miscast occurs, with the spell backfiring dangerously :skull:
:weary: The spell manifests faintly due to a wild magic surge :weary:
:face_with_raised_eyebrow: The spell functions as intended, but triggers a random wild magic effect :face_with_raised_eyebrow:
:sunglasses: A surge of power amplifies the spell, delivering maximum damage or extending its duration :sunglasses:
:fire: A critical surge empowers the spell, greatly increasing its potency or duration :fire:
